name: Fluidmorpher's Fanfare

name: Surpresa Riffs
abilities: [{"stats": [], "value": 0, "cardTypes": ["equipment"], "actionType": "flip_target_battlegear", "abilityType": "action", "description": "Vire de cabeça para baixo (flip) um Equipamento de Batalha alvo", "targetScope": "enemy", "targetTribes": [], "actionPayload": null}]

name: Prelude to Dominance
abilities: [{"stats": [], "value": 0, "cardTypes": [], "actionType": "modify_stats_map", "abilityType": "action", "description": "Cause 10 de dano à Criatura alvo.", "targetScope": "self", "targetTribes": [], "actionPayload": {"effectType": "decrease", "valuesByStat": {"energy": 10}}}]

name: Melody of Mirrored Actions
abilities: [{"stats": [], "value": 0, "cardTypes": [], "actionType": "destroy_target_battlegear", "abilityType": "action", "description": "Destrua um Equipamento de Batalha (Battlegear) alvo equipado em uma Criatura engajada.", "targetScope": "self", "targetTribes": [], "actionPayload": {"targetMustBeEquippedAndEngaged": true}}]

name: Diminuendo
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature loses 5 Energy and 5 to all Disciplines.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"reduce_stats","notes":"Reduz a Energia e todas as Disciplinas do alvo.","payload":{"energy_amount":-5,"discipline_amount":-5}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Dischord of Flame
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature gains Fire. If that Creature already has Fire, it gains 'Fire 5' instead.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_or_keyword","notes":"Alvo ganha Fogo ou Fogo 5 se já tiver Fogo.","payload":{"element":"fire","keyword":"fire","amount":5}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Harmonics of Water
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature gains Water. If that Creature already has Water, it gains 'Water 5' instead.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_or_keyword","notes":"Alvo ganha Água ou Água 5 se já tiver Água.","payload":{"element":"water","keyword":"water","amount":5}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Howl of the Wind
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature gains Air. If that Creature already has Air, it gains 'Air 5' instead.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_or_keyword","notes":"Alvo ganha Ar ou Ar 5 se já tiver Ar.","payload":{"element":"air","keyword":"air","amount":5}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Swarming Battlesong
abilities: [{"description":"If the caster is engaged, the opposing engaged Creature and the caster each gain Energy equal to their lowest Discipline.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_energy_equal_to_lowest_discipline","notes":"Conjurador e oponente engajado ganham energia igual à sua menor disciplina.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Battlesong of Renewal
abilities: [{"description":"Caster heals 25 damage.","effectType":"heal","battleRules":{"type":"heal_caster","notes":"Cura 25 de dano no conjurador.","payload":{"amount":25}},"targetScope":"caster","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Fluid Fugue
abilities: [{"description":"Heal 25 damage to target Creature. If the caster of this Mugic has Water, that Creature gains a Mugic counter.","effectType":"heal","battleRules":{"type":"heal_and_gain_mugic_counter_if_element","notes":"Cura 25 e dá um contador de Mugic se o conjurador tiver Água.","payload":{"amount":25,"element":"water"}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Interlude of Interruption
abilities: [{"description":"Negate target Mugic unless the casting Creature of that Mugic pays an additional Mugic counter.","effectType":"negate","battleRules":{"type":"negate_mugic_unless_cost","notes":"Nega uma Mugic a menos que o conjurador pague um custo adicional.","payload":{"additional_cost":1}},"targetScope":"target_mugic","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Bond of Elemental Attunement
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature gains all of its Scanned Elemental Types.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"regain_scanned_elements","notes":"O alvo recupera todos os seus tipos elementais escaneados.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Symphony of Shielding
abilities: [{"description":"Target attack or Mugic deals 0 damage.","effectType":"protection","battleRules":{"type":"negate_damage_from_source","notes":"Nega o dano de um ataque ou Mugic alvo.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_attack_or_mugic","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Battlesong of Depletion
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures engaged with the caster lose all Elemental Types.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"remove_all_elements_from_engaged","notes":"Criaturas engajadas com o conjurador perdem todos os tipos elementais.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Consuming Cacophony
abilities: [{"description":"Deal 20 damage to target Creature. If the caster of this Mugic has Fire, deal an additional 10 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"deal_damage_with_elemental_bonus","notes":"Causa 20 de dano, mais 10 se o conjurador tiver Fogo.","payload":{"base_amount":20,"bonus_amount":10,"element":"fire"}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Counterpoint of Chaos
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature cannot gain Elemental Types.","effectType":"restriction","battleRules":{"type":"prevent_elemental_gain","notes":"Impede o alvo de ganhar tipos elementais.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Decomposition
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature fails all Discipline checks on attacks it plays.","effectType":"restriction","battleRules":{"type":"fail_all_discipline_checks","notes":"O alvo falha em todos os testes de disciplina em seus ataques.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Searing Symphony
abilities: [{"description":"Deal 10 damage to target Creature for each Elemental Type it has.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"deal_damage_per_element","notes":"Causa 10 de dano por tipo elemental que o alvo possui.","payload":{"amount_per_element":10}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Ancestral Anthem
abilities: [{"description":"Remove a Creature Card from your general discard pile from the game. If you did, Activate Hive.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"remove_creature_to_activate_hive","notes":"Remove uma criatura do descarte para ativar o Hive.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"own_discard_pile","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Elemental Counterpoint
abilities: [{"description":"Target attack deals 10 less damage for each Elemental Type it has.","effectType":"damage_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"reduce_attack_damage_per_element","notes":"Reduz o dano de um ataque em 10 por tipo elemental que ele possui.","payload":{"amount_per_element":-10}},"targetScope":"target_attack","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Empowering Encore
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature gains all Elemental Types Creatures in your discard pile have.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_elements_from_discard","notes":"O alvo ganha todos os tipos elementais das criaturas na sua pilha de descarte.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Rocky Refrain
abilities: [{"description":"Target engaged Creature gains 5 Energy for each Elemental Type the opposing engaged Creature has. If the caster of this Mugic has Earth, the target Creature gains an additional 5 Energy for each Elemental Type the opposing engaged Creature has.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_energy_per_opponent_element_with_bonus","notes":"Ganha energia por elemento do oponente, com bônus se o conjurador tiver Terra.","payload":{"base_amount_per_element":5,"bonus_amount_per_element":5,"element":"earth"}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Unbalancing Battlesong
abilities: [{"description":"Caster gains 15 Energy and Creatures engaged with caster lose 15 Energy.","effectType":"stat_modifier","battleRules":{"type":"energy_swing_caster_vs_engaged","notes":"Conjurador ganha 15 de energia e criaturas engajadas perdem 15.","payload":{"amount":15}},"targetScope":"caster_and_engaged","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Aebis' Airia
abilities: [{"description":"Negate target attack. The next attack played deals 0 damage.","effectType":"protection","battleRules":{"type":"negate_attack_and_next_attack","notes":"Nega um ataque e o próximo ataque causa 0 de dano.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_attack","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Bonding Battlesong
abilities: [{"description":"When target opposing Creature heals or gains Energy from a Mugic or activated ability, the caster of this Mugic also heals or gains that much Energy.","effectType":"reaction","battleRules":{"type":"copy_heal_or_energy_gain","notes":"Copia a cura ou ganho de energia de um oponente alvo.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Silent Requiem
abilities: [{"description":"Negate target Mugic or ability that targets a Creature with Invisibility.","effectType":"negate","battleRules":{"type":"negate_source_targeting_invisible","notes":"Nega Mugic ou habilidade que tem como alvo uma criatura com Invisibility.","payload":{}},"targetScope":"target_mugic_or_ability","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Sonata of Storms
abilities: [{"description":"Target Creature gains 'Range' and 'Swift 3'. If the caster of this Mugic has Air, that Creature also gains 'Invisibility: Surprise'.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_keywords_with_elemental_bonus","notes":"Ganha Range e Swift 3, com bônus de Invisibility se o conjurador tiver Ar.","payload":{"keywords":["range","swift 3"],"bonus_keyword":"invisibility: surprise","element":"air"}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Song of Translocation
abilities: [{"description":"Relocate target Creature you control to any unoccupied space on the Battleboard.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"relocate_own_creature","notes":"Realoca uma criatura aliada para um espaço desocupado.","payload":{"requiresEmptySpace":true}},"targetScope":"target_creature","targetTribes":[]}]
